description.value: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, [[/r 4d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}, and 4 acid splash damage. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 2*(4d6) #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}

description.value:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 4d8 fire damage, [[/r 4 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}, and 4 fire splash damage. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 2*4 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}

description.value:
Activate A Strike

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals 4d6 electricity damage and 4 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes flat-footed until the start of your next turn. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

rules.text: Effect: Target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of my next turn.

description.value:
The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 4d6 cold damage and 4 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -15-foot penalty.

rules.text: Effect: Target takes a -15-foot penalty to its Speeds.

description.value: Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Contains formulas for all common alchemical items of 19th level or lower

A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Activate 1 Interact

Your features transform into something bestial and you take on muscle mass, but your lumbering form is clumsy.

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks and unarmed attack rolls. You gain a claw unarmed attack ([[/r 1d8 #slashing]] slashing damage) with the agile trait and a jaws unarmed attack ([[/r 1d10 #piercing]] piercing damage). You gain the weapon specialization with the claws and jaws, or greater weapon specialization, if you already have weapon specialization with these unarmed attacks.

Drawback You take a -1 penalty to AC and a -2 penalty to Reflex saves.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major)]{Effect: Bestial Mutagen (Major)}

Activate A Interact

After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant.

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 45 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save you get a critical success instead, and you critical failures on Fortitude saves become failures instead.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks and initiative rolls.

Duration 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)]{Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)}

Activate A

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r 10d6+27]] Hit Points and gain +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.consumable-effects.Effect: Elixir of Life (True)]{Effect: Elixir of Life (True)}

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 #acid splash]]{4 acid splash damage} and [[/r 4d6 #persistent acid]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 #fire splash]]{4 fire splash damage} and [[/r 4 #persistent fire]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}

Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 #electricity splash]]{4 electricity splash damage} and the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 #cold splash]]{4 cold splash damage} and the target takes a 15-foot penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

description.value:
Ingnovim carries

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Major)]{Acid Flask (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Major)]{Alchemist's Fire (Major)}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bestial Mutagen (Major)]{Bestial Mutagen (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Major)]{Bottled Lightning (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Major)]{Frost Vial (Major)}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (True)]{Elixir of Life (True)}

These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations.

Trigger Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe Strike;

Effect The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a Fortitude save to resist the injection.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Failure The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} for 24 hours.

Critical Failure The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}. Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends.
Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any bestial mutagens but is still affected normally by other mutagens.
Ingnovim draws an alchemical bomb with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike.
